source.61ad0a43: from rx import of, operators as op
source.32237ebf:
test1 = of("hello",1,123.2,"H","Thank you")
sub1 = test1.pipe(
   op.materialize()
)
sub1.subscribe(lambda x: print("The value is {0}".format(x)))
